kpi_info.title: LTE REDIRECTIONS PREVENTED BY TIMER
kpi_info.use: The number of times when Smart LTE Layering is prevented by timer RNMOBI->SmartLTELayeringPrevT. High value in this counter may indicate insufficient coverage of the target LTE layer, or incorrect neighbour cell definition. UPDATED: When Smart LTE Layering would trigger RRC Connection Release, but it is prevented by timer RNMOBI->SmartLTELayeringPreventionT.
